dct_title_s: NOUVELLE CARTE D’ANGLETERRE, D’ECOSSE et D’IRLANDE, AVEC DES INSTRUCTIONS POUR CONNOITRE LES DIFFERENTS ETATS de la Couronne d’Angleterre en Europe, Asie, Afrique, et Amerique
dct_description_sm: Map of Great Britain flanked by two hemispherical maps of the world. The western hemisphere map (to the left of Scotland) shows California as an island with two northern bays. The small map is titled: MAPPE-MONDE OU PARTIE DU GLOBE POUR FAIRE CONNOITRE. LES ETATS DE L’ANGLE TERRE DANS L’AMERIQUE.

Issued in his: Atlas historique, ou, nouvelle introduction à l’histoire, à la chronologie & à la géographie ancienne & moderne ..., Vol. 2 [Map 43]. -- Amsterdam, 1705-20. Vol 2. dated 1708. Reissued in 1714 and 1735.
Avec Privilege de Nosseigneurs les Etats de Hollande et de Westfrise. (lower left).
The maps are surrounded by text and tables. The shields of Great Britain, England, Scotland, and Ireland are included.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
